infos.value: Lord Sadali...?
You appear quite pleased...
Oh, can you tell?
The report from Vistralle...?
Quite.
It would seem that Oelde is no more, and Sterne has acquired his father's ring.
That is most delightful news.
Another ancient relic will soon be in Lord Sadali's possession...
Yet...Vistralle is not to be trusted.
Right you are. I am of the very same mind.
Although I am not one to doubt others without evidence...
That ring holds far too much power to leave to chance.
Tzztztzt...
...News?
I see.
Lord Sadali...?
I am told that Rundall has ransacked our sacred church.
What's more, Gilgamesh attempted to intervene and sustained a serious wound in the process...
We must return to the church immediately and—!
No. We need not hurry ourselves.
Both Rundall and Gilgamesh have apparently withdrawn.
That said, the damage was vast.
You are to head straight for Dynverk Cathedral.
And Lord Sadali...?
I am bound for Leonis Castle. It is time for me to take hold of that ring.
An excellent decision, my lord.
Soon, Lord Sadali will rule over this land as king—
No. As a god.
I shall return to the church once I have the ring.
Be careful, my lord...
May the light of the Crystals guide us.
